title: Halo 3-Landfall-Arms Race-720pHD
description:
A group of Marines races to pinpoint the location of Master Cheif as he breaks through the atmosphere.

Halo 3: Landfall, a combination of Neill Blomkamp's three previously-released live-action short videos depicting the events leading up to the first level of Halo 3. Edited together as a standalone piece for the first time, these three shorts are the first glimpse at what a live-action Halo could look like and a must-see for Halo fans of every stripe.

Presented in 720p high definition.


Duration- 6:58
Sound- 2.0 Stereo
